text: Bhowani Junction is a 1956 American romantic adventure movie directed by George Cukor and was based on the 1954 novel of the same name by John Masters. It stars Ava Gardner, Stewart Granger, Bill Travers, Abraham Sofaer, Peter Illing, Freda Jackson, Lionel Jeffries, Neelo and was distributed by Metro- Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1956 romance movies Category:1956 adventure movies Category:American romance movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by George Cukor Category:Movies about race and ethnicity Category:Movies set in Pakistan
title: Bhowani Junction (movie)
